attributes.action: officially change the name of Northern Ireland to NORN IRON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ever since the third home rule act was implemented Northern Ireland has always been refered to as Norn Iron by its ulster-scots indigenous population.
I feel that in light of current sporting success and other patriotic achievements in all aspects of science and arts, i feel that this name change would help get nationalist support behind the partition of ireland and create a lovely wee country.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
